page.title: 14ASTON HOUSE FARM-SUDBURY..2
page.content: On the farm there are five tractors and a horse box, a plough and seeder two horses,kept for hunting and two dogs. The{grass}does not just grow of its own accord, but has to be sown with high quality seed in order to get high quality hay and silage. { Oil seed rape}is the yellow flowered crop that we see in April.When harvested it is used for margarine and cooking oil. { Wheat}is grown to be eventually turned into bread and biscuits. { Barley}is produced for cattle feed. The farm consists of many different fields all of which bear ancient names,the following are some of their names:_Little Intock,Big Meadow, Pingles, Bottom Pingles,Common Piece, Square Field,Young Stock, Garrots, Floodbank,Hovel,Big Swan and Hensilage
